slogan: Take the step – stay on track!
enter_details: Enter your first and last name
name_instructions: Please write your full name correctly without errors.
username_rules: Only letters, numbers, and '-' character are allowed.
username_error: Please do not place '-' at the beginning or end of the username.
username_instructions: Spaces, emojis, and offensive words are not allowed.
timezone_instructions: To receive tasks at the correct time, enter your country or city name and select the appropriate timezone.
